sampleRequest.body:
{
  "description": "Group with designated owner and members",
  "displayName": "Operations group",
  "groupTypes": [
    "Unified"
  ],
  "mailEnabled": true,
  "mailNickname": "operations2019",
  "securityEnabled": false,
  "owners@odata.bind": [
    "https://graph.microsoft.com/beta/users/e4446055-7ad0-40b2-abc3-4e44d1f0e59f"
  ],
  "members@odata.bind": [

    "https://graph.microsoft.com/beta/users/4b2971a5-9d3f-4de2-80fc-37cb0cd1d554"
  ]
}
